UnitType.Description: A peasant with a stick.
UnitType.Backstory: The Order of the Phoenix Shield has long guarded the caravan and trade routes through the great Central Wasteland. Decades of skirmishes with wildling and darkling tribes have left the average soldier of New Hallas well trained even before joining the army proper. It is in the Knight-Errant orders that New Hallas finds true strength.

UnitType.Description: A peasant with a stick.
UnitType.Backstory: Only the strong survive in the swamps of Piatra. Life is a vicious competition for resources, from first hatching to young adulthood. Piatran soldiers as a rule are devious, bloodthirsty, and completely devoid of any moral limitations on their ambition. Unfortunately for the aspiring Piatran Brood Commander, each of this broodmates harbors the same ambitions.

UnitType.Description: Archers are lightly equipped and skilled at picking off their opponents at a distance.

UnitType.Description: Dreg Archers are lightly equipped and count on numbers to kill their opponents. Some Thralls are more shattered then others when put through the soulbending rituals, but the Primarchs attempt to get all value from their broken possessions.
UnitType.Backstory: The Primarchs of Piatra tolerate no interference in their affairs, and systematically drive out any neighboring human, wildling, or darkling tribes. Yet it would simply not do to waste potential resources. Using their skill at dark magics, the Primarchs of Piatra bend the minds and wills of these unfortunate dregs, to serve as Thralls in their army.

The Primarchs of Piatra tolerate no interference in their affairs, and systematically drive out any neighboring human, wildling, or darkling tribes. Yet it would simply not do to waste potential resources. Using their skill at dark magics, the Primarchs of Piatra bend the minds and wills of these unfortunate dregs, to serve as Thralls in their army.

The Order of the Phoenix Shield has long guarded the caravan and trade routes through the great Central Wasteland. Decades of skirmishes with wildling and darkling tribes have left the average soldier of New Hallas well trained even before joining the army proper. It is in the Knight-Errant orders that New Hallas finds true strength.

Only the strong survive in the swamps of Piatra. Life is a vicious competition for resources, from first hatching to young adulthood. Piatran soldiers as a rule are devious, bloodthirsty, and completely devoid of any moral limitations on their ambition. Unfortunately for the aspiring Piatran Brood Commander, each of this broodmates harbors the same ambitions.

The Order of the Phoenix Shield has long guarded the caravan and trade routes through the great Central Wasteland. Decades of skirmishes with wildling and darkling tribes have left the average soldier of New Hallas well trained even before joining the army proper. It is in the Knight-Errant orders that New Hallas finds true strength.

Piatran soldiers as a rule are devious, bloodthirsty, and completely devoid of any moral limitations on their ambition. Unfortunately for the aspiring Piatran Brood Commander, each of this broodmates harbors the same ambitions.

UnitType.Description: Crossbowmen can fire through units in lines and are a great way to deal with masses of enemy units.

UnitType.Description: Defenders are formidable troops that are able to outlast enemy units and absorb lots of damage.

UnitType.Description: The Redwatch are good early skirmishers, quick to train and good in most battles. They learn faster than other faction's warriors and can become experienced units after only a few battles.
UnitType.Backstory: The Order of the Phoenix Shield has long guarded the caravan and trade routes through the great Central Wasteland. Decades of skirmishes with wildling and darkling tribes have left the average soldier of New Hallas well trained even before joining the army proper. Decades of skirmishes with wildling and darkling tribes have left the average soldier of New Hallas well trained even before joining the army proper. It is in the Knight-Errant orders that New Hallas finds true strength.

UnitType.Description: Axeman are good early skirmishers, though they can't wield shields their Cleave ability allows them to attack multiple enemies at once.
UnitType.Backstory: Only the strong survive in the swamps of Piatra. Life is a vicious competition for resources, from first hatching to young adulthood. Piatran soldiers as a rule are devious, bloodthirsty, and completely devoid of any moral limitations on their ambition. Using their skill at dark magics, the Primarchs of Piatra bend the minds and wills of these unfortunate dregs, to serve as Thralls in their army.

UnitType.Description: Mages deal magical damage at range, use them to decimate enemies that rely on physical defense.
UnitType.Backstory: The Order of the Phoenix Shield has long guarded the caravan and trade routes through the great Central Wasteland. Decades of skirmishes with wildling and darkling tribes have left the average soldier of New Hallas well trained even before joining the army proper. It is in the Knight-Errant orders that New Hallas finds true strength.

UnitType.Description: Using globs of oily pitch naturally found in their home swamps, the mages of Piatra are quick to adapt to turning fire against their enemies.
UnitType.Backstory: Only the strong survive in the swamps of Piatra. Life is a vicious competition for resources, from first hatching to young adulthood. Piatran soldiers as a rule are devious, bloodthirsty, and completely devoid of any moral limitations on their ambition. UnitType.Description: Paladins are the most expensive and powerful units that can be trained. They combine the best armor, weapons and enchanted items with reliable mounts and advanced training.
UnitType.Backstory: The Order of the Phoenix Shield has long guarded the caravan and trade routes through the great Central Wasteland. Decades of skirmishes with wildling and darkling tribes have left the average soldier of New Hallas well trained even before joining the army proper. It is in the Knight-Errant orders that New Hallas finds true strength.

UnitType.Description: The Chosen are outfitted with enchanted weapons and items. They are a powerful tool for any empire, but expensive to train.

UnitType.Description: The Blades of Athica are good midgame units for your armies. Though they receive little special training many heroes have risen from their number.
UnitType.Backstory: The Order of the Phoenix Shield has long guarded the caravan and trade routes through the great Central Wasteland. Decades of skirmishes with wildling and darkling tribes have left the average soldier of New Hallas well trained even before joining the army proper. It is in the Knight-Errant orders that New Hallas finds true strength.

UnitType.Description: Swordsmen are great midgame units. Their swords leave a hand free for a shield and their counterattack ability allows them to strike back at enemies that attack them.

UnitType.Description: The Scourge are good midgame units for your armies. Although they aren't as well trained as other faction's soldiers they can be trained quickly and overwhelm the enemy.
UnitType.Backstory: These are the dregs who have survived the soulbending rituals of the Piatran Primarchs. Tortured shells of their former selves, they are still more than capable enough of serving as willing sacrifices, hurling themselves to their death for their new masters.

UnitType.Description: Swordsmen are great midgame units. Their swords leave a hand free for a shield and their counterattack ability allows them to strike back at enemies that attack them.
UnitType.Backstory: Only the strong survive in the swamps of Piatra. Life is a vicious competition for resources, from first hatching to young adulthood. Piatran soldiers as a rule are devious, bloodthirsty, and completely devoid of any moral limitations on their ambition. Unfortunately for the aspiring Piatran Brood Commander, each of this broodmates harbors the same ambitions.

Piatran soldiers as a rule are devious, bloodthirsty, and completely devoid of any moral limitations on their ambition. Unfortunately for the aspiring Piatran Brood Commander, each of this broodmates harbors the same ambitions.

The Primarchs of Piatra tolerate no interference in their affairs, and systematically drive out any neighboring human, wildling, or darkling tribes. Yet it would simply not do to waste potential resources. Using their skill at dark magics, the Primarchs of Piatra bend the minds and wills of these unfortunate dregs, to serve as Thralls in their army.

The Primarchs of Piatra tolerate no interference in their affairs, and systematically drive out any neighboring human, wildling, or darkling tribes. Yet it would simply not do to waste potential resources. Using their skill at dark magics, the Primarchs of Piatra bend the minds and wills of these unfortunate dregs, to serve as Thralls in their army.

The Primarchs of Piatra tolerate no interference in their affairs, and systematically drive out any neighboring human, wildling, or darkling tribes. Yet it would simply not do to waste potential resources. Using their skill at dark magics, the Primarchs of Piatra bend the minds and wills of these unfortunate dregs, to serve as Thralls in their army.

UnitType.Description: Use Explorers to explore the world. Hallastan Explorers take longer to train but they last longer than the scouts of other factions.
UnitType.Backstory: The Order of the Phoenix Shield has long guarded the caravan and trade routes through the great Central Wasteland. Decades of skirmishes with wildling and darkling tribes have left the average soldier of New Hallas well trained even before joining the army proper. It is in the Knight-Errant orders that New Hallas finds true strength.

UnitType.Description: Use scouts to explore the world.
UnitType.Backstory: Only the strong survive in the swamps of Piatra. Life is a vicious competition for resources, from first hatching to young adulthood. Piatran soldiers as a rule are devious, bloodthirsty, and completely devoid of any moral limitations on their ambition. Unfortunately for the aspiring Piatran Brood Commander, each of this broodmates harbors the same ambitions.

The Order of the Phoenix Shield has long guarded the caravan and trade routes through the great Central Wasteland. Decades of skirmishes with wildling and darkling tribes have left the average soldier of New Hallas well trained even before joining the army proper. It is in the Knight-Errant orders that New Hallas finds true strength.

These are the dregs who have survived the soulbending rituals of the Piatran Primarchs. Tortured shells of their former selves, they are still more than capable enough of serving as willing sacrifices, hurling themselves to their death for their new masters.

UnitType.Description: Sions are the most skilled warriors of the fallen. Though they can't learn magic they gain levels and traits as champions.

UnitType.Backstory: These are the dregs who have survived the soulbending rituals of the Piatran Primarchs. Tortured shells of their former selves, they are still more than capable enough of serving as willing sacrifices, hurling themselves to their death for their new masters.

UnitType.Description: Crusaders are the elite troops of the Order of the Phoenix Shield.
UnitType.Backstory: The Order of the Phoenix Shield has long guarded the caravan and trade routes through the great Central Wasteland. Decades of skirmishes with wildling and darkling tribes have left the average soldier of New Hallas well trained even before joining the army proper. It is in the Knight-Errant orders that New Hallas finds true strength.

UnitType.Description: Crusaders are the elite troops of the Order of the Phoenix Shield.
UnitType.Backstory: The Order of the Phoenix Shield has long guarded the caravan and trade routes through the great Central Wasteland. Decades of skirmishes with wildling and darkling tribes have left the average soldier of New Hallas well trained even before joining the army proper. It is in the Knight-Errant orders that New Hallas finds true strength.

GameModifier.Provides: -5% Unrest in the city this unit is in

UnitType.Quote: 'The knowledge of Vakul still holds power.'
UnitType.NPCRecruitmentText: I can be of service. If you wish to hire me for %d gildar.
UnitType.Backstory: Goran Vakul once ruled these lands, and though his rule has ended, the power which he used to maintain it is still applicable. Ssvar Anoth is a Lesser Primarch of Piatra, and knows much of the dark rituals of the ancient empires.

GameModifier.Provides: -5% Unrest in the city this unit is in

UnitType.Quote: 'The age of Glory is at hand.'
UnitType.NPCRecruitmentText: I can be of service. If you wish to hire me for %d gildar.
UnitType.Backstory: The potent fumes of the Khabat spores, used in Piatran religious rituals, have strongly affected Toss. She firmly believes that this world is an illusion, and that she is being tested by her masters.

GameModifier.Provides: -5% Unrest in the city this unit is in

UnitType.Quote: 'If it moves, I can kill it.'
UnitType.NPCRecruitmentText: I can be of service. If you wish to hire me for %d gildar.
UnitType.Backstory: Unlike most of his Piatran countrymen, Yatjo prefers to apply his talents 'personally'. For him, there is no greater affirmation of dominance than causing the death of another.

GameModifier.Provides: -5% Unrest in the city this unit is in

UnitType.NPCRecruitmentText: I can be of service. If you wish to hire me for %d gildar.
UnitType.Backstory: Primarch Atja Vala is one of the most ruthless of the Patrian priesthood. She oversees the 'recycling' operations in Voltosh, where unusable thralls are molded into skeleton servitors.

GameModifier.Provides: -5% Unrest in the city this unit is in

UnitType.NPCRecruitmentText: I can be of service. If you wish to hire me for %d gildar.
UnitType.Backstory: Second to Goran IX only, Primarch Njegos Vakul controls the Piatran priesthood. He wields vast power, and at his command thousands die. He is young for his position, filled with ambition and lust for power.

GameModifier.Provides: -5% Unrest in the city this unit is in

UnitType.Quote: 'My loyalty is now to the Order of the Phoenix Shield.'
UnitType.NPCRecruitmentText: I can be of service. If you wish to hire me for %d gildar.
UnitType.Backstory: I trained with Relias, yes, but that path is not for me. I needed more structure, more stability. The Order of the Phoenix Shield gave this to me.

GameModifier.Provides: -5% Unrest in the city this unit is in

UnitType.Quote: 'My order was once one of healers.'
UnitType.NPCRecruitmentText: I can be of service. If you wish to hire me for %d gildar.
UnitType.Backstory: Once my order dedicated themselves to protecting pilgrims and travellers. We still do that, to an extend, but it is a secondary objective now. I seek to maintain the sanctity and traditions of the Order of the Phoenix Shield, even in the face of our new direction.

GameModifier.Provides: -5% Unrest in the city this unit is in

UnitType.Quote: 'We must take our crusade into the wildlands.'
UnitType.NPCRecruitmentText: I can be of service. If you wish to hire me for %d gildar.
UnitType.Backstory: Attar Peroni is the head of a Chapter House on the edge of the Central Wastelands. For years, he has defended the frontier against wilding raids and worse. He has longed for an opportunity to strike out against the uncivilized tribes, and is glad to finally have one.

GameModifier.Provides: -5% Unrest in the city this unit is in

UnitType.NPCRecruitmentText: I can be of service. If you wish to hire me for %d gildar.
UnitType.Backstory: A vigilant guard is ever needed. As my order advances, we must always be wary to not overextend. I am honored to help bring civilization to the wastes, but it is not an easy task.

GameModifier.Provides: -5% Unrest in the city this unit is in

UnitType.Quote: 'The day is at hand! Let us bring Light to the Darkness!'
UnitType.NPCRecruitmentText: I can be of service. If you wish to hire me for %d gildar.
UnitType.Backstory: The holy task of bringing Order to Chaos is never complete! I have dedicated my life to this end, and will continue until my death. Let the great gleaming Sword of Justice prevail! All those who die on this Holy Crusade shall be reborn, Phoenixes risen from the ashes to grant us everlasting Glory!
